c.e:
showTransformationDialog === ShowTransformation.READ_ONLY
					? [{ label: en.connectors.buttons.close, onClick: onCloseDialog, variant: "text" }]
					: [{ label: en.connectors.buttons.discardChanges, onClick: onCloseDialog, variant: "text" }]

<Box display={"flex"} justifyContent="space-between" alignItems="center" flexDirection={"row"}>
					<SolaceTypography variant="h1">{en.connectors.labels.transformationDetails}</SolaceTypography>
					<SolaceButton
						variant="link"
						href={
							!isSap
								? en.connectors.buttons.transformationsLink.hrefLink
								: en.connectors.buttons.transformationsLink.hrefSapLink
						}
					>
						{en.connectors.buttons.transformationsLink.label}
					</SolaceButton>
				</Box>

<Box display={"flex"} justifyContent="space-between" alignItems="center" flexDirection={"row"}>
					<SolaceTypography variant="h1">{en.connectors.labels.transformationDetails}</SolaceTypography>
					<SolaceButton
						variant="link"
						href={
							!isSap
								? en.connectors.buttons.transformationsLink.hrefLink
								: en.connectors.buttons.transformationsLink.hrefSapLink
						}
					>
						{en.connectors.buttons.transformationsLink.label}
					</SolaceButton>
				</Box>

<Box data-qa="ai-mapping-dialog-title" display="flex" alignItems="center" gap={2}>
						<SolaceTypography variant="h2" fontWeight="500">
							{en.connectors.labels.mapWithAI}
						</SolaceTypography>
						<SolaceFeatureTag text="Beta" />
					</Box>
